childMarkdownRemark.html:
About Me

I'm Ivor, a Front-End Web Developer from Venezuela who loves working with JavaScript and other web technologies.

I started my journey as a web developer some 10 years ago when I started submitting templates and themes to ThemeForest. Since then I've been creating apps, websites, tools for my personal use and more recently Chrome Extensions to improve my workflow in the role I'm currently working at.

I'm currently working as a Senior Code Reviewer at Envato and my role involves expertise in a wide range of areas, but most importanly in Web Development and Design.
